name: Mia (itch)
description:
Mia is on the way to the cimmetery with a pack of white roses, but as a clumsy person, she falls and lose her rose. Let's help her find it on this cinematic made in 5 days. 

- Mélisande Armand

- Gabriel Audisio

- Antonin Azulay-Barsacq

- Alexandre Cadinot

- Ambre Mantzaridès Jouffret

- Quentin Delmas

- Thibault Vincent
